title: AlleleMatrix Class — AlleleMatrix
text:
pagination Pagination matrix preview Default Value = false
'preview' set true, server return lists 'callSetDbIds', 'variantDbIds', 'variantSetDbIds'. dataMatrixNames dataMatrixNames list names (ie 'Genotype', 'Read Depth' etc). dataMatrixAbbreviations dataMatrixAbbreviations comma seperated list abbreviations (ie 'GT', 'RD' etc). positionRanges postion range search
Uses format ":-" chromosome name, starting position range, ending position range germplasmNames list human readable Germplasm names germplasmPUIs list permanent unique identifiers associated Germplasm germplasmDbIds list IDs uniquely identify Germplasm within given database server sampleDbIds list IDs uniquely identify Samples within given database server callSetDbIds list IDs uniquely identify CallSets within given database server variantDbIds list IDs uniquely identify Variants within given database server variantSetDbIds list IDs uniquely identify VariantSets within given database server expandHomozygotes homozygotes expanded (true) collapsed single occurrence (false) sepPhased string used separator phased allele calls. sepUnphased string used separator unphased allele calls. unknownString string used representation missing data. using searchResult function page page number results return, starting 0 pageSize maximum number results return per page

title: BrAPIClient Class — BaseBrAPIClient
text: server Get sets server. case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining. format Get sets format format response server, either  'list', 'json', 'string' 'raw'. case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining. authentication Sets authentication, can either Bearer token authentication provider function dry_run Get sets client perform dry run case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining. verbosity Get sets verbosity level used. See verbosity httr2 package details case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining. max_tries Get sets maximum number attempt request make. case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining. multi Controls happens query argument value vector. null passes query argument value concatenated string. Eg. c('example1', 'example1') converted 'example1', 'example1' see .multi https://httr2.r-lib.org/reference/req_url.html' case setting returns BrAPIClient allow chaining.
